statements: SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule
SELECT crop_name, rotation_number FROM crop_rotation_schedule
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE rotation_number = 1
SELECT crop_name, last_rotated_date FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE next_rotation_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, crop_name, next_rotation_date FROM crop_rotation_schedule ORDER BY next_rotation_date DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE rotation_number = 1 ORDER BY last_rotated_date DESC;
SELECT crop_name, rotation_number FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE next_rotation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY next_rotation_date ASC;
SELECT id, crop_name, rotation_number, last_rotated_date, next_rotation_date FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE crop_name LIKE '%beans%';
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE last_rotated_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT crop_name, COUNT(*) AS rotation_count FROM crop_rotation_schedule GROUP BY crop_name HAVING rotation_count > 2 ORDER BY rotation_count DESC, crop_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule;
SELECT crop_name, rotation_date FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, rotation_date FROM crop_rotation_schedule ORDER BY rotation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM soil_health_data WHERE soil_moisture > 0.5;
SELECT crop_name, soil_ph FROM crop_rotation_schedule INNER JOIN soil_health_data ON crop_rotation_schedule.id = soil_health_data.crop_id;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule ORDER BY rotation_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT crop_name, rotation_date FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE crop_name = 'Tomato';
SELECT crop_name, AVG(soil_ph) AS avg_ph FROM crop_rotation_schedule JOIN soil_health_data ON crop_rotation_schedule.id = soil_health_data.crop_id GROUP BY crop_name;
SELECT crop_name, JSON_EXTRACT(soil_nutrients, '$.nitrogen') AS nitrogen_content FROM soil_health_data WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT crop_name FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE rotation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT crop_name, harvest_date FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE planting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT field_name, field_size FROM field_information WHERE field_size > 5;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE crop_name = 'Corn';
SELECT soil_type, pH_level FROM soil_health_data ORDER BY pH_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule ORDER BY planting_date DESC, crop_name ASC;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE planting_date >= '2022-01-01' AND planting_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT soil_type, pH_level FROM soil_health_data WHERE pH_level > 6.5;
SELECT field_name, field_size FROM field_information WHERE field_size > 10 ORDER BY field_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE crop_name LIKE '%corn%' ORDER BY harvest_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE rotation_sequence > 3;
SELECT field_name, field_size FROM field_information ORDER BY field_size DESC;
SELECT crop_name, crop_family, planting_seeds FROM rotation_crops WHERE planting_seeds < 500;
SELECT * FROM field_rotation WHERE rotation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY rotation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule ORDER BY rotation_sequence DESC;
SELECT field_name, field_size FROM field_information WHERE soil_type = 'Clay' AND field_size > 100 ORDER BY field_id ASC;
SELECT crop_name, planting_seeds FROM rotation_crops WHERE crop_family = 'Grains' AND planting_seeds BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT crs.crop_name, fr.rotation_date FROM crop_rotation_schedule AS crs JOIN field_rotation AS fr ON crs.id = fr.crop_id WHERE fr.rotation_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT fi.field_name, crs.crop_name FROM field_information AS fi INNER JOIN field_rotation AS fr ON fi.field_id = fr.field_id INNER JOIN crop_rotation_schedule AS crs ON fr.crop_id = crs.id WHERE fi.soil_type = 'Loam';
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE id = 1;
SELECT soil_condition, notes FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE crop_name = 'Tomato';
SELECT * FROM soil_health WHERE nitrogen_level > 5;
SELECT field_name, size, soil_type FROM field_conditions ORDER BY size DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule ORDER BY planting_date ASC, harvest_date DESC;
SELECT crop_name, soil_condition FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE id = 3;
SELECT field_name, size, soil_type FROM field_conditions WHERE size > 1000 ORDER BY size DESC;
SELECT crop_name, optimal_ph, water_requirements FROM crop_types WHERE optimal_ph BETWEEN 6.0 AND 7.5;
SELECT field_name, drainage_system, previous_crop FROM field_conditions WHERE soil_type = 'Loamy' AND drainage_system = 'Tile' ORDER BY field_name ASC;
